titles.title: Disabled Veterans Insurance Act of 2007
A bill to amend section 1922A of title 38, United States Code, to increase the amount of supplemental insurance available for totally disabled veterans.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2087-2088)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
2/15/2007--Introduced.
Disabled Veterans Insurance Act of 2007 - Increases from $20,000 to $40,000 the maximum amount of supplemental service disabled veterans' insurance for totally disabled veterans.
